member.name: T:StairsTool.LandingDirection
member.summary: Defines the direction of the second flight of stairs after the landing, from the perspective of someone standing at the bottom of the staircase looking up.

member.name: F:StairsTool.LandingDirection.Straight
member.summary: Second flight continues in the same direction as the first flight

member.name: F:StairsTool.LandingDirection.Left
member.summary: Second flight turns left from the landing (when viewed from bottom of stairs)

member.name: F:StairsTool.LandingDirection.Right
member.summary: Second flight turns right from the landing (when viewed from bottom of stairs)

member.name: T:StairsTool.StairShape
member.summary: Defines different types of stair shapes that can be generated.

member.name: F:StairsTool.StairShape.Straight
member.summary: A straight staircase with no turns

member.name: F:StairsTool.StairShape.Curved
member.summary: A curved staircase that turns while ascending

member.name: F:StairsTool.StairShape.Landing
member.summary: A staircase with a landing/platform between two flights
